casebody.data:
SEA RANCH OWNERS ASSO.
v.
SEA RANCH. No. 338P06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 3, 2007. K. Edward Greene, Raleigh, Alyssa M. Chen, William S. Hoyle, Rocky Mount, for Sea Ranch Owners Asso. Steven C. Frucci, Virginia Beach, VA, for Sea Ranch II, Inc.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 15th day of March 2007 by Defendant for Sanctions Pursuant to Rule 34 of the N.C. Rules of Appellate Procedure:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 3rd day of May 2007."

Justices MARTIN and HUDSON recused.
